tool_description: The A.I. Smartable API offers the artificial intelligence news, learning resources, companies, influencers, events and other information.
name: A.I. Smartable
title: A.I. Smartable

api_list.name: GetNews
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://a-i-smartable.p.rapidapi.com/news/page/1/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "a-i-smartable.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://a-i-smartable.p.rapidapi.com/news/page/{page}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "a-i-smartable.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
